department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
**Public Service Beware of Digital Pitot Static Test Set Requirement**
=================================================================

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

* Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has issued a Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for the acquisition of one item: **Digital Pitot Static Test Set - 2 quantities**.
* The requirement is to support the DASH 8 Aircraft Fleet for Transport Canada, Air Services Directorate.
* The acquisition will be made under the Trade Agreement: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) / World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP) / Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) / Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) / Free Trade Agreements with Peru / Colombia / Panama / Korea / UK.

**Supply Arrangement**

* This requirement is open only to Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders for procurement of T8493-140035 series.
* The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

    + Aero Precision Industries LLC
    + Aero Supplies Inc
    + Non-Destructive Testing Products Ltd
    + Maxcraft Avionics Ltd.
    + MHD Rockland
    + Patlon Aircraft & Industries Ltd.
    + Pole Air Aviation
    + Simex Defence Inc
    + Standard Aero
    + Tower Aerospace
    + Tulmar Safety
    + Unisource Technology Inc
    + Vector Aerospace Atlantic
    + Zepoli International Inc
    + PHP Canada
    + 3 Points Aviation
    + BSF International Inc
    + Avmax Aviation
    + Field Aviation
    + JHT Defense
    + Kadex Aero Supply
    + Newcastle Aviation Partners LLC
    + Southeast Aerospace
    + Canada West Avionics
    + CanRep Inc.
    + Voyageur Avparts Inc.
    + Genaire LTD
    + Kitchener Aero (dba Mid-Canada Mod Center)
    + PAL Aerospace
    + Tronosjet Maintenance
    + Aero Technical Components
    + Arnprior Aerospace
    + Pratt & Whitney Canada
    + Trans Capital Air
    + Bristow Instruments (1977) Ltd
    + CASP Aerospace Inc

**Proposal Instructions**

* Suppliers on the permanent list or able to meet qualification requirements are eligible to submit a proposal.
* The proposals must be submitted directly by the Contracting Authority to the Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders who are being invited
